title: Looking to trade Cy Young bare hand for Broad Leaf 350
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking to trade Cy Young bare hand for Broad Leaf 350
posts.post_content:
Anyone have a BL350 sitting around and would prefer a blue chip HOFer?   I can add cars or cash if necessary.  

I'm not too picky other than paper loss on the back has to be pretty minimal.  

I'd say Young would be an easy "2" with a decent shot at a "2.5"
